$:/PSaT/lastModified/sidebar.text:
<small>
<$wikify name=last-tooltip text="""Last saved change "{{$:/temp/lastModifiedDate!!last-modified-tiddler}}" (excludes system tiddlers)""">
<$button tooltip=<<last-tooltip>> class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/info-button}} </$button>
Last Change: <$view tiddler="$:/temp/lastModifiedDate" format=date template="hh:mm on DDth of MMM YYYY" /><<lastModifiedDate>>
</$wikify>
<$wikify name=last-tooltip text="""System tiddler {{$:/temp/lastModifiedSystemDate!!last-modified-tiddler}} at <$view tiddler="$:/temp/lastModifiedSystemDate" format=date template="hh:mm on DDth of MMM YYYY" /><<lastModifiedDate>> (excludes state and temp tiddlers) """>
<$button tooltip=<<last-tooltip>> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/options-button}}</$button>
</$wikify>
</small>
$:/PSaT/lastModified/sidebar.title: $:/PSaT/lastModified/sidebar
$:/PSaT/lastModified/sidebar.creator: dev

last-modified.bundle.title: last-modified.bundle
last-modified.bundle.description: Display last modified tiddler/system tiddler in SideBar at load
last-modified.bundle.creator: dev
